The impact of your shield sends foes tumbling to the ground. When you use Shield Wallop, after its other effects, the target attempts a @Check[fortitude|against:guardian|options:inflicts:off-guard,inflicts:prone,inflicts:stunned] saving throw against your class DC. If your shield is a tower shield, fortress shield, or another shield that grants a higher circumstance bonus to AC when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover] behind it, the target takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty to this saving throw.

Critical Success The target takes no additional effect.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to you until the end of the current turn.

Failure The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The target is knocked prone and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.
